verses.verse: שִׁ֥יר <S%H7892><s%> shir A Song הַֽמַּעֲל֑וֹת <S%H4609><s%> ham-ma-'a-Lot; of degrees מִמַּעֲמַקִּ֖ים <S%H4615><s%> mi-ma-'a-mak-Kim Out of the depths קְרָאתִ֣יךָ <S%H7121><s%> ke-ra-Ti-cha have I cried יְהוָֽה׃ <S%H3068><s%> Yah-weh. unto thee O LORD

אֲדֹנָי֮ <S%H136><s%> 'a-do-Nai Lord שִׁמְעָ֪ה <S%H8085><s%> shim-'Ah hear בְק֫וֹלִ֥י <S%H6963><s%> ve-Ko-Li my voice תִּהְיֶ֣ינָה <S%H1961><s%> tih-Yei-nah Let אָ֭זְנֶיךָ <S%H241><s%> 'A-ze-nei-cha let thine ears קַשֻּׁב֑וֹת <S%H7183><s%> kash-shu-Vot; be attentive לְ֝ק֗וֹל <S%H6963><s%> le-Kol, to the voice תַּחֲנוּנָֽי׃ <S%H8469><s%> ta-cha-nu-Nai. of my supplications

אִם־ <S%H518><s%> 'im- If עֲוֹנ֥וֹת <S%H5771><s%> a-vo-Not iniquities תִּשְׁמָר־ <S%H8104><s%> tish-mor- shouldest mark יָ֑הּ <S%H3050><s%> Yah; If thou LORD אֲ֝דֹנָ֗י <S%H136><s%> 'a-do-Nai, O Lord מִ֣י <S%H4310><s%> mi who יַעֲמֹֽד׃ <S%H5975><s%> ya-'a-Mod. who shall stand

כִּֽי־ <S%H3588><s%> ki- for עִמְּךָ֥ <S%H5973><s%> 'im-me-Cha there הַסְּלִיחָ֑ה <S%H5547><s%> has-se-li-Chah; But [there is] forgiveness לְ֝מַ֗עַן <S%H4616><s%> le-Ma-'an, that תִּוָּרֵֽא׃ <S%H3372><s%> tiv-va-Re. with thee that thou mayest be feared

קִוִּ֣יתִי <S%H6960><s%> kiv-Vi-ti I wait יְ֭הוָה <S%H3068><s%> Yah-weh for the LORD קִוְּתָ֣ה <S%H6960><s%> kiv-ve-Tah doth wait נַפְשִׁ֑י <S%H5315><s%> naf-Shi; my soul וְֽלִדְבָר֥וֹ <S%H1697><s%> ve-lid-va-Ro and in his word הוֹחָֽלְתִּי׃ <S%H3176><s%> ho-Chal-ti. do I hope

נַפְשִׁ֥י <S%H5315><s%> naf-Shi My soul לַֽאדֹנָ֑י <S%H136><s%> la-do-Nai; [waiteth] for the Lord מִשֹּׁמְרִ֥ים <S%H8104><s%> mish-sho-me-Rim more than they that watch לַ֝בֹּ֗קֶר <S%H1242><s%> lab-Bo-ker, for the morning שֹׁמְרִ֥ים <S%H8104><s%> sho-me-Rim [I say more than] they that watch לַבֹּֽקֶר׃ <S%H1242><s%> lab-Bo-ker. for the morning

יַחֵ֥ל <S%H3176><s%> ya-Chel hope יִשְׂרָאֵ֗ל <S%H3478><s%> Yis-ra-'El, Let Israel אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> 'el- in יְה֫וָה <S%H3068><s%> Yah-weh in the LORD כִּֽי־ <S%H3588><s%> ki- for עִם־ <S%H5973><s%> 'im- with יְהוָ֥ה <S%H3068><s%> Yah-weh for with the LORD הַחֶ֑סֶד <S%H2617><s%> ha-Che-sed; [there is] mercy וְהַרְבֵּ֖ה <S%H7235><s%> ve-har-Beh and with him [is] plenteous עִמּ֣וֹ <S%H5973><s%> im-Mo with פְדֽוּת׃ <S%H6304><s%> fe-Dut. redemption

וְ֭הוּא <S%H1931><s%> Ve-hu and He יִפְדֶּ֣ה <S%H6299><s%> yif-Deh And he shall redeem אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> 'et- יִשְׂרָאֵ֑ל <S%H3478><s%> Yis-ra-'El; Israel מִ֝כֹּ֗ל <S%H3605><s%> mik-Kol, all עֲוֹנֹתָֽיו׃ <S%H5771><s%> 'a-vo-no-Tav. from all his iniquities
